a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Number of people affected by natural disasters, 1900 to 2019
Global number of people affected by natural disasters. This is defined as "people requiring immediate assistance
during a period of emergency, i.e. requiring basic survival needs such as food, water, shelter, sanitation and
Source: EMDAT (2020): OFDA/CRED International Disaster Database, Universit catholique de Louvain Brussels Belgium
